thread.title: BRIEF-Bucher Industries Forecasts Improved Operating Profit Margin For Reporting Year 2017

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Bucher Industries Forecasts Improved Operating Profit Margin For Reporting Year 2017
text:
Jan 31 (Reuters) - Bucher Industries Ag:
* FOR REPORTING YEAR 2017, GROUP FORECASTING IMPROVED OPERATING PROFIT MARGIN AND A “SIGNIFICANT” INCREASE IN GROUP PROFIT​
* ‍GROUP FY 2017 ORDER INTAKE CHF 2.87 BILLION VERSUS CHF 2.39 BILLION
* ‍GROUP FY 2017 NET SALES CHF 2.65 BILLION VERSUS CHF 2.38 BILLION
* ‍KUHN GROUP IS FORECASTING SALES TO GROW IN 2018 AND FOR OPERATING PROFIT MARGIN TO IMPROVE​
* ‍SALES GROWTH FOR MUNICIPAL VEHICLES WILL BE VERY STRONG IN FIRST HALF OF 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
